span.strong: We have created a more organized webpage for COVID-19 Resources, Click here to be directed to the page.
span.span: You can also find this page in the DISTRICT drop down tab labelled COVID-19.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID 19 Page

div.h1: RCW Board of Education Vision & Mission Statement

span.p: Vision Statement: Future Ready, Jaguar Proud.
Mission Statement: The Renville County West School District prepares students to be contributing members of a changing society through supportive and relevant educational strategies.

img.title: Dear Jaguars, We miss you all very, very much! Feel the Roar. Staff holding signs
img.alt: Dear Jaguars, We miss you all very, very much! Feel the Roar. Staff holding signs

a.title: Go to comments for Staff Photo

span.p:
We've got this! Stay positive!
Check out this video from our coches to our students.
https://youtu.be/BFKjAbxuk5g

a.title: Go to comments for Be the light video

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Jennifer Bratsch, Student of 3rd Quarter

a.title: Go to comments for Student of the Quarter

br.span: Click here to see the short video.

span.span: RCW is excited to feel the roar as our new RCW logo joins the team to help us carry on our Jaguar tradition. Spot the new logo on the prowl as Jaguar nation has arrived!
To read the RCW Press Release, click here.

a.title: Go to comments for Feel the roar

span.p:
Scan the QR code to download our new app
or click below

a.title: Go to comments for Download our new app

strong.span: Click on the Jaguar below to go to the RCW Media YouTube site.
Subscribe to get email updates for live events!

span.span: Events that are streamed live are only Varsity Games. (usually around 7:30 PM)
